title: Mass Cure Wounds
content:
Mass Cure Wounds Level 5 Evocation Spell 3~24 Healing 3d8+WIS/CHA Unleash a soothing hum of energy that heals you and nearby allies. No effect on undead and constructs. 18m Action Level 5 Spell Slot

Mass Cure Wounds

Level 5 Evocation Spell

Unleash a soothing hum of energy that heals you and nearby allies.

No effect on undead and constructs.

Mass Cure Wounds is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Mass Cure Wounds is a Lvl 5 Spell from the Evocation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Mass Cure Wounds Information

Description: Unleash a soothing hum of energy that heals you and nearby allies. Level: Lvl 5 spell School: Evocation School Casting Time: Action Range: Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw:

How to Acquire Mass Cure Wounds

Mass Cure Wounds can be acquired by the following classes: Bard, Cleric, Life Domain, Druid, Solidarity Domain Mass Cure Wounds can be cast by using the following Items: ???

Bard, Cleric, Life Domain, Druid, Solidarity Domain
